meanings.sent1: The imparity in opportunities between the two candidates was evident.
meanings.sent2: The imparity in wealth distribution is a pressing issue in our society.
meanings.sent3: The imparity in ice cream flavors at the party caused some playful arguments.
meanings.sent4: The imparity in sunlight between the two rooms made one seem brighter than the other.
meanings.sent5: The imparity in sizes of the cakes made it hard to choose just one.

meanings.definition: Inequality or difference in rank or status
meanings.sent1: The imparity in their social circles made it challenging for them to connect.
meanings.sent2: The imparity in salaries between the employees led to discontent within the company.
meanings.sent3: The imparity in superhero powers among the team members made for an interesting dynamic.
meanings.sent4: The imparity in book genres on the shelf reflected the diverse interests of the household.
meanings.sent5: The imparity in shoe sizes between the siblings caused some confusion during the shoe swap.
